mapper.sql: ut.pkid,ut.case_Code, ut.inst_Code, ut.task_Job_Code, ut.CREATE_TIME, ut.candidate_Id, ut.task_Id,ut.TASK_DEFINATION_KEY
mapper.select:
select
from sctrans.T_TO_UNLOCATED_TASK as ut left join sctrans.T_TO_CASE as tc on ut.case_code=tc.case_code where (candidate_Id is null and tc.org_id=#{orgId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}) or ut.candidate_Id=#{candidateId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
